# <a name="print-an-attachment-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-102">Outlook.com 'de ek yazdırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-102">Print an attachment in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-103">Yazdırmak istediğiniz eki içeren iletiyi açın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-104">İmlecinizi ekin üzerine getirin ve **diğer eylemler** simgesini seçin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-105">> **İndirin**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-106">Dosya indirildikten sonra uygun programla açın ve yazdırma seçeneğini belirtin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-107">Örneğin, bir. doc dosyasını Word 'de açın ve yazdırın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f7e9f-108">Daha fazla bilgi için [Outlook.com uygulamasında e-posta iletilerini, ekleri ve takvimleri yazdırın](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7e9f-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
